moves.2. f4 d5: The Falkbeer, though we didn't know it by name...
moves.3. Bb5+: Um... OK, that's one way to decline the countergambit...
moves.3... Nd7: H'mmm. Well, we were 16 and had no grasp of strategy or tactics.
moves.4. Nh3: ??? I guess he was guarding his KBP.
moves.5. O-O: Well... OK, it is a developing move I guess...
moves.8. Qh5+: Oh, yeah! How long ago was this open?
moves.9... Ke6: J. B. doesn't have any good moves.
moves.11. Rf5+: T. M. has 5 pieces in play. It's over.

gameName: Two of my friends in a friendly from HS
